Get choices from survey name (and concatenate if you want!)

Source: R/kobo_utils.R
get_survey_choices.Rd

Get choices from survey name (and concatenate if you want!)

Usage

get_survey_choices(survey, choices, col, conc = TRUE, label = FALSE, sep = "_")

Arguments

survey

(df[1+, (type = character, list_name = character, name = character, ...)]) A survey sheet from Kobo (already split with columns list_name and name present).

choices

(df[1+, (list_name = character, label = character, name = character, ...)]) A choices sheet from Kobo (with column list_name, label and name).

col

(character[1]) A column.

conc

(logical[1]) Boolean. Should choices be concatenated to column name? Default to TRUE. Can only be used together with label = FALSE.

label

(logical[1]) Whether labels be returned. It returns a data.frame with two columns: "name" and "label".

sep

(character[1]) Separator for choices' concatenation.

Value

(character | df) A character vector of choices or pasted to col choices with a separator.
